attributes.action: Bring back free swimming for under 16s and over 60s in Medway
attributes.additional_details: Swimming is a life skill and low income families cannot afford to regularly take their children swimming plus pay for themselves every week. More and more children’s parks and playgrounds are being knocked down and now their free swimming has being taken away and another skill will be lost. Over 60s rely on this as their only form of exercise or social activity.
attributes.background: Bring back free swimming for under 16s and over 60s in Medway

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about access to local swimming facilities are a matter for the operator, not the UK Government or Parliament.
